quoteText:
Withdrawal of consent

If at any time a Registered User wishes to withdraw their consent to this policy they can do so via their profile settings page.
title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: If at any time a Registered User wishes to withdraw their consent to this policy they can do so via their profile settings page. Withdrawal of consent will result in the Account concerned being suspended and scheduled for termination. All content, activity and associated information relating to the Account will be removed as part of this process.
